text: Are there any new betas I can join? I have a new site launching soon and it would be nice to prepare.

Hi, I just downloaded the "Scrolling Animations" module from the asset marketplace. The instructions prompted me to add the module to the bottom of the template I am using. The template I am working out of however is not drag and drop, it is a custom HTML template that hubSpot built. Does anyone know if the scrolling animations module works on non drag and drop templates?
